effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Selects another friendly Pokémon at random.  Removes all of that Pokémon's stat changes.

This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
effect_entries.short_effect: Resets a friendly Pokémon's stat changes.

flavor_text_entries.text:
使うと　味方の　ポケモンの
能力変化が　元に　戻る。

When used, it restores any stat
changes of an ally Pokémon.

Usandolo, tutte le modifiche alle statistiche
di un Pokémon della squadra saranno annullate.

Tarjeta necesaria para introducir la contraseña en
la Fragata Plasma.

Hebt bei Gebrauch Statusveränderungen
deines Mitstreiters auf.

Permet d’annuler les variations de stats d’un
Pokémon de l’équipe.

사용하면 같은 편 포켓몬의
능력 변화가 원래대로 되돌아간다.

つかうと　みかたの　ポケモンの
のうりょく　へんかが　もとにもどる。

When used, it restores any stat
changes of an ally Pokémon.

When used, it restores any stat
changes of an ally Pokémon.

Permet d’annuler les variations de
stats d’un Pokémon de l’équipe.
